description: 3 vertical sections: left: plywood covered with small vertical pieces of thin wood painted blue, purple and maroon; pieces glued on and raised from surface; middle: piece of plywood covered with vertical indentations and painted maroon with purple highlights; right: paper printed with or dyed with thin, vertical strands of blue and maroon; wood frame
medium: Color on paper, wood, and wood chips
title: Works (Hanga), B.V.C.
